nodeDescription.value: Account Recovery
Account Registration

nodeTitle.value: Check If No Existing Session Token

nodeDescription.value: Verify Email
Change Password

annotation.value: Call Check Agreement and Email verification Sub-Flow

nodeDescription.value: Set your custom MFA policy ID here, if left empty default MFA Policy ID would be considered

annotation.value: The agreementID has to be added from PingOne.
Display sign on page to user

nodeDescription.value: MFA Device Registration

annotation.value: CIAM Plus - Registration and Authentication with Username and Password - Main Flow
Enable social logins via variables: ciam_googleEnabled,ciam_facebookEnabled, ciam_appleEnabled

nodeTitle.value: Check If Agreement Id Is Empty

nodeDescription.value: Device Authentication
User has atleast one active device

annotation.value: Check if some MFA device is registered for user and can be used

nodeDescription.value: MFA Device Registration
Verify Email

nodeTitle.value: Auto Enroll Email as MFA device

nodeDescription.value: Enroll the email as a MFA device

annotation.value: Step up to register Email MFA device if no MFA devices found during authentication
Note: Email device should be enabled in MFA Policy as email device will be auto enrolled during registration
Enable MFA for user, if it is disabled

nodeDescription.value: Attempts to read the user in PingOne by the submitted userID

annotation.value: Returned for Require MFA: User has to compulsarily register MFA device apart from email
Returned for Offer MFA: User can skip registering 2nd MFA device

nodeTitle.value: Send Password Has Been Reset Email

annotation.value: Return success message & session created for 2 days
Return success message & session created for 2 days
Customized generic error message will be shown to the user on this screen
Select no notifications to be send when new device paired in MFA policy in PingOne as custom notifications are integrated using PingOne Notifications connector
Session created for rememberMe (if selected), pwd, MFA methods like email, fido2 (depending on the authentication/registration path user has taken)
Check session for user if clicked on rememberMe during their last signOn
During registration/authentication, after email verification email will automatically be added as MFA device for both require & offer MFA.
Caution: Email will be auto enrolled
During MFA device registration, default MFA policy will be considered.
During MFA device authentication, policy ID placed in the first node will be used, if not, default will be taken.

customHTML.value:
<!-- Check whether the end-user browser is supporting WebAuthn to understand if security keys and platform biomentic method are usable -->
<form id="webAuthenSupportForm" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="webAuthenSupport" id="webAuthenSupport">
    <button type="hidden" data-skcomponent="skbutton" data-skbuttontype="form-submit" class="hidden-button"  data-skbuttonvalue="submit" data-skform="webAuthenSupportForm" id="autoSubmit">Next</button>
</form>
